name: pm2-logs
readme:
pm2-logs
========

Pm2 cli logs interface

![pm2-logs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/keymetrics/pm2-logs/master/pres.gif)

### Programmatic useformat:

```javascript
var logs = require('pm2-logs')({format: 'some moment format'})
``` 

### Test

```shell
node bin/index.js
sh test/test.sh
```
